review: Someone finally made a tech product that even I could install and get running with NO help.  Quite the accomplishment.  Extremely easy to hook up and start using.  Literally, within minutes I was watching the original Jurassic Park with my wife and daughter.  Every tech product should be as user friendly as this, although I realize I expect things to be more simple than I have a right to.  This product delivers!
author: Amazon Customer

author: megan bates

review: Generally the Amazon Fire TV box does what it is supposed to. The controls are responsive and the unit is fast. There are issues using the Amazon music service as it demands that your TV stay on as long as you are playing music, which is unnecessary and a waste of energy.  Other music streaming services don't have this same issue.  The Fire TV customer reps were excellent in one call, pleasant, engaging and competent, and in another call, irritated and unhelpful and did not get back to me as promised. Installation was simple and setup also easy.
